question: Chiefs vs. Lions
description:
In the upcoming NFL game, scheduled for September 7, 8:20 PM ET:

If the Kansas City Chiefs win, the market will resolve to “Chiefs”.

If the Detroit Lions win, the market will resolve to “Lions”.

 If the game is not completed by September 14, 2023 (11:59 PM ET) or it ends in a tie, the market will resolve 50-50.

events.title: NFL
events.description: This is a market group for NFL games happening on 2023-09-07

question: Will Drake's album drop on 9/22?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Drake's album "For All the Dogs" is released on September 22, 2023 (12 AM ET - 11:59 PM PT). Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If the album is not released on 9/22, this market will resolve to "No." If it releases at 12 AM ET Sep 22, it resolves "Yes", likewise if it releases at 11:30 PM PT Sep 22, it resolves "Yes."

The primary resolution source for this market will be Spotify or Apple Music, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Will Lee become a Category 5 hurricane?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the tropical system currently named Lee is designated Category 5 (a hurricane with maximum sustained winds of greater than or equal to 157 mph) at any point according to official National Hurricane Center advisories (https://www.nhc.noaa.gov/archive/2023/). If Lee dissipates without ever becoming a Category 5 hurricane, this market will resolve to "No."

This market will immediately resolve to "Yes" based on any initial advisory released by the NHC that Lee has become a Category 5 hurricane regardless of any later retraction or analysis that may contradict the initial announcement.

question: Was the moon landing faked?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if conclusive proof that any or all of the United States moon landings were faked becomes public by December 31, 2023, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market will be a consensus of credible reporting.

question: Adesanya vs. Strickland
description:
This is a market group about UFC 293, an upcoming mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that is scheduled to take place on September 9, 2023, at Qudos Bank Arena, Sydney Olympic Park, Australia.

This is a market on whether Israel Adesanya or Sean Strickland will win their bout.

If Israel Adesanya is declared the winner of this bout, this market will resolve to “Adesanya”. If Sean Strickland is declared the winner of this bout, this market will resolve to “Strickland”.

If this fight is declared a draw, or if for any reason the match is not scored, postponed after September 16, 2023, 11:59 PM ET, or cancelled, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will Israel Adesanya win by finish?
description:
This is a market group about UFC 293, an upcoming mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that is scheduled to take place on September 9, 2023, at Qudos Bank Arena, Sydney Olympic Park, Australia.

This is a market on whether Israel Adesanya will win his upcoming bout with Sean Strickland by finish. To "win by finish" means winning by KO/TKO/disqualification, submission, or any other form of stoppage. Any decision made by the judges will not count as a finish.

This market will resolve to “Yes” if Israel Adesanya wins his UFC 293 bout with Sean Strickland by finish. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If for any reason the match is not scored, postponed after September 16, 2023, 11:59 PM ET, or cancelled, this market will resolve 50-50.
groupItemTitle: Will Israel Adesanya win by finish?

question: Will Nina Agdal win restraining order against Dillon Danis?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Nina Agdal is granted any type of restraining order against Dillon Danis by October 14, 2023 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US Courts, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.
